main.title: Nomad Club online shop
main.earnPointsEnterYourCard: To earn points for a purchase, enter your card number
main.whereFindCardNumber: Where can I find the card number?
main.findCardNumberText: On the front of your credit or debit card. The number is usually located at the bottom of the card and consists of 16 digits

banner1.title: BASIC T-SHIRT
banner1.text:
9900 ₸ 

Global Nomads basic t-shirts are the embodiment of comfort and style. Made from soft, high-quality cotton, they are perfect for both everyday wear and active leisure.
banner1.bonus: For every 200 KZT spent you will receive 1 Point
banner1.bonusStep4: Make a purchase on the partner's website
banner1.bonusStep5: Points will be added to your account

banner2.title: Make up and skin care
banner2.detailText: Discover the ultimate beauty experience with our partner. Explore a wide range of top-quality products from renowned brands, all conveniently available at your fingertips. Plus, earn bonus Nomad Club points with every purchase, bringing you closer to exclusive rewards and discounts. Experience luxury and convenience today!

banner3.title: Travel suitcases and accessories
banner3.detailText: Embark on your journey with sophistication by browsing our curated collection of suitcases, backpacks, and travel essentials online. Elevate your travel experience with our premium range of luggage and accessories, meticulously crafted for both functionality and style. As you prepare for your next adventure, accumulate points with each purchase, unlocking exclusive rewards and privileges through our loyalty program. Travel in elegance and convenience with us.

banner4.title: Make up and skin care
banner4.detailText: Experience the seamless convenience of procuring premium-grade supplements and vitamins online! Immerse yourself in our carefully curated selection, meticulously crafted to elevate your health and vitality. Accumulate rewards with each purchase, unveiling exclusive perks and savings. Begin your journey towards optimal health today and indulge in the sophistication of shopping with us!

banner5.title: Nomad Club: Exclusive Member Benefits
banner5.detailText:
Welcome to Nomad Club, Air Astana’s loyalty programme designed to reward and recognize our most valued travelers.  
We believe your loyalty deserves to be celebrated with exclusive benefits tailored just for you.Membership Tiers Nomad Club offers four tiers of membership: Blue, Silver, Gold, and Diamond. Each tier provides you with distinct advantages that enhance your travel experience. Upon joining the programme, all members start at the Blue tier. As you travel with Air Astana and accumulate tier points, you will have the opportunity to advance through the tiers and unlock more privileges. To qualify for Silver, Gold, or Diamond membership, you must meet the specified criteria within a single calendar year (from January 1 to December 31). Once you meet these requirements, you will receive a unique membership card and access to an array of additional benefits.
